hint: Never lose your customer and easy to buy and pay
login_error1: Enter the store email and password
login_error2: Enter the e-mail of the store correctly
login_error4: Something went wrong. Please verify the entered e-mail and password
hint2: To start receiving payments, your account must be activated by providing a copy of the commercial register or self-employment document and personal identity, and that all documents are valid and provide a bank account number with a name identical to the name of its establishment in the records and documents at the time of submitting the application
hint3: Do you want to log out of the application?
make_a_request: Create a new order and send it to the customer
get_link: Get an order link and send it to your customers to pay
storing_move: The stock movement of the product
toast: There is no main product image to delete!!
add_image: Click here to add additional product images
caution: Please note that the addition priority will be to the product main image if it is empty
caution2: Caution: any changes will be neglecting, do you want to proceed?
caution3: Do you really want to delete this product?
network_error1: Please make sure that your phone is connected to the Internet
data_error: Something went wrong, please try again
connection_error: Please make sure you have a stable internet connection
product_properties_hint: Please define product characteristics before adding
product_image_hint: Please add a main image of the product
product_name_hint: Please add a product name before adding it
product_price_hint: Please add a price for the product before adding it
main_image_hint: Please add a main product image first
connection_error_orders: Something went wrong. Please check your internet connection and try again
new_passwords_hint: Enter a new password to change the password
select_choice_to_perform: Choose one of the operations to perform
deletion_caution: Do you really want to delete this image?
add_youtube_link: Enter a new YouTube channel link
click_here: Click here to add an additional image of the product
